import React, { Component } from "react"; import "semantic-ui-css/semantic.min.css"; import { Button, Divider, Grid, Header, Icon, Image, Menu, Table } from "semantic-ui-react"; class Dashboard extends Component { state = { dropdownMenuStyle: { display: "none" } }; handleToggleDropdownMenu = () => { let newState = Object.assign({}, this.state); if (newState.dropdownMenuStyle.display === "none") { newState.dropdownMenuStyle = { display: "flex" }; } else { newState.dropdownMenuStyle = { display: "none" }; } this.setState(newState); }; render() { return (
